meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Karli Kosman Lauren Henderson Alex Albrecht Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4412.

div.div:
2003 College Championship quarterfinal game 2.
From Yale University.

td.p: Karli Kosman, a sophomore at Mt. San Jacinto College from Temecula, California
Lauren Henderson, a senior at Colby College from Oneida, New York
Alex Albrecht, a junior at Purdue University from Clinton, Indiana

tr.td: NEW HAVEN
THE MATRIX
COLLEGES & UNIVERSITIES
AMERICA'S MOST WANT ADS
REALLY OLD HISTORY
BODY TALK

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'He moved to New Haven in 1822 & it was there in 1843 he would expire (verb; to breathe one\'s last breath: to die)')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: He moved to New Haven in 1822 & it was there in 1843 he would expire (verb; to breathe one's last breath: to die)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_2_1', 'clue_J_2_1_stuck', 'One of these (of 2 similar black cats, for instance) usually means a glitch in The Matrix')

tr.td: One of these (of 2 similar black cats, for instance) usually means a glitch in The Matrix
